title: SUPERGRASS Announces North American Dates Celebrating 1995's I Should Coco
description: Happening this September. The post SUPERGRASS Announces North American Dates Celebrating 1995's I Should Coco appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: Supergrass has announced North American tour dates celebrating the 30th anniversary of the band's classic 1995 debut album, I Should Coco. The shows kick off on September 2 in Mexico City and wind down September 12 in Boston with stops in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago and New York. And if you're wondering, Supergrass is still their original lineup of Gaz Coombes, Mick Quinn, Danny Goffey, and Rob Coombes. Get your tickets here. "15th May 2025 marks 30 years since I Should Coco. Supergrass are thrilled to announce their return to perform the début album live, in its entirety, for the first time," said Supergrass' Mick Quinn. "Dynamic pricing not included." 9/2 Mexico City, MX Teatro Metropolitan9/5 Los Angeles, CA Hollywood Palladium9/6 San Francisco, CA The Warfield9/9 Chicago, IL Riviera Theater9/11 New York, NY The Rooftop at Pier 179/12 Boston, MA MGM Music Hall at Fenway Want More Metal? html:
Supergrass has announced North American tour dates celebrating the 30th anniversary of the band's classic 1995 debut album, I Should Coco. The shows kick off on September 2 in Mexico City and wind down September 12 in Boston with stops in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago and New York. And if you're wondering, Supergrass is still their original lineup of Gaz Coombes, Mick Quinn, Danny Goffey, and Rob Coombes. Get your tickets here.

"15th May 2025 marks 30 years since I Should Coco. Supergrass are thrilled to announce their return to perform the début album live, in its entirety, for the first time," said Supergrass' Mick Quinn. "Dynamic pricing not included."

9/2 Mexico City, MX Teatro Metropolitan
9/5 Los Angeles, CA Hollywood Palladium
9/6 San Francisco, CA The Warfield
9/9 Chicago, IL Riviera Theater
9/11 New York, NY The Rooftop at Pier 17
9/12 Boston, MA MGM Music Hall at Fenway
